course_description: This course does for the New Testament what the preceding does for the Old. In addition to covering the latest research in Gospels, Jesus, Paul, the Catholic Letters, and Revelation, with particular attention to its implications for congregational teaching and witness. It will include discussion of the key moments in the history of interpretation, hermeneutics and exegesis, and the pertinent research methods.
sections: Class Nbr: 5326, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: W 12:30-2p, Instructor: D. Jeong, Status: Open
